text:

name: sfchronicle
text: Today, California recorded 7,820 new coronavirus cases, the second highest number of new daily cases. The highest number was recorded on Monday, with 8,196 cases in a day, according to county data compiled by The Chronicle. https://t.co/kSMUgev7Yp

name: sfchronicle
text: A Cambodian refugee is set to be released from San Quentin and could be handed to immigration authorities, who could deport him. Immigration advocates are calling on the governor to intervene and help the man, who they say has COVID-19 symptoms. https://t.co/HyGDgwqVqa
